articles.title: South African government says it won’t help 4,000 illegal miners inside a closed mine - CNN
articles.description: South Africa’s government says it will not help about 4,000 illegal miners inside a closed mine in the country’s North West province as part of an official policy against illegal mining.
articles.content:
South Africas government says it will not help about 4,000 illegal miners inside a closed mine in the countrys North West province as part of an official policy against illegal mining.
